fullplot: Jan Holman, a Dutch documentary maker, runs in a Czech alcohol clinic into Jaromèr Nohavica, an ultrafamous singer/songwriter. Holman gets interested in Jaromèr and follows him during his comeback. To help his former guitarist Karel Plèhal, who is unable to speak anymore, Nohavica decides to cooperate with the band Cechomor. The success is overwhelming, the combination attracts full houses. But soon the success draws a heavy toll on the band members and Jan Holman.
plot: Documentary maker Jan Holman follows the ultrafamous singer/songwriter Jaromèr Novahica during his tour with the band Cechomor. The combination is very succesful, but it draws a heavy toll on the band members and Jan Holman.
title: Year of the Devil
